thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Argentine biotech firm Bioceres puts off IPO for one day

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Argentine biotech firm Bioceres puts off IPO for one day
text:
BUENOS AIRES, Feb 6 (Reuters) - Argentine biotechnology firm Bioceres on Tuesday extended until Feb. 7 the offer period for investors interested in the companyâ€™s initial public offering, according to a letter the company sent to the local stock market regulator.
Originally the offer period ended on Tuesday. The company did not explain the reasons for the extension, which indicated the offering will close on Thursday.
Reporting by Walter Bianchi, writing by Hugh Bronstein
